item.title: Alexa and Uncle Jim
item.description: A man finds that his 13 year old niece has the hots for him and she is actively trying to seduce him. He can't possibly give in can he? What would his wife think? Come along on this story to find out what happens to Jim and his hot little niece named Alexa.

item.title: The Girl-of-the-Month Club, Part 5
item.description: The rich can buy anything in America. Knowing this, one clever entrepenuer started a service for gentlemen called The Girl-of-the-Month Club. For a fee, you could subscribe to have a different teen or preteen girl, delivered to your house for an overnight sexual fantasy. Each month you would receive a different girl, dressed to provide the fantasy. This is the story of one year in the life of Blake Winthope and how he enjoyed his subscription. Part 5 is about how May's Child, The Teenage Slut, surprises him and his buddies at their monthly poker game.

item.title: Kate Versus the Zombies, Part 1
item.description: I know what Loliwood needs--more zombies! This story is about the mid-point in a much larger tale I've had bouncing around my brain for a few years now; here, we are introduced to eleven-year-old Kate, a skilled zombie killer and--this will surprise you to learn--a nymphomaniac. Self-proclaimed 'dirtiest girl you've ever met.' This is part one of four parts.

item.description: When little eight year old Darla meets a grown man called Jerry at the theater she doesn't know he's just struck out on his own to produce child porn independently, or that he's looking for a girl just like her to be his star.
